title: Kikazaru Koi ni wa Riyuu ga Atte
overview: Masiba Kurumi works as a PR manager of a company popular among young people on social networks of interior design companies. She is a fashionista who cares very much about her appearance and what others think. She works hard to earn the admiration of colleagues and chief Hayama Sogo.Kurumi is so busy with work that he forgets to extend the rent of his apartment. Her friend Coco helps her find a new place... But it's a shared house with three strangers! There's Fujino Shun, a minimalist chef who wants to live a simple life. Then there's Terai Haruto, Shun's cousin, who works as an online consultant to help people with their problems. Finally, there is Hase Ayaka, an aspiring artist who works in contemporary art, working part-time as a delivery driver in an elite supermarket.And these people of different ages, professions and values gather under one roof.
